replies.body: damn i thought being a one trick was a meme in itself

> [{quoted}](name=0DESTROYERZ0,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cGqxdeii,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-31T20:49:13.094+0000)
>
> damn i thought being a one trick was a meme in itself

I thought so too, but depending on what you play and where you can actually one trick consistently.

Pretty much any marksman can be played bot lane (Azir is probably the only one that can't).

Most of the marksmen that are not designed for other lanes can still be taken mid or top as a one-trick player.
Can confirm, take it from a {{champion:98}} one trick
As if the Yas main wouldn't dodge
